name: Steem WP
author: Steem WP

sections.description:
The Steem WP plugin offers you more control, security, and possibilities with the Steem Blockchain.

We plan to soon build in more services as well as offer support services.

What is already ready:

  • Steem Connect login, which means you do NOT have to give us your account keys, and we do NOT send your keys to any third-party sites.
  • Ability to see stats on your wallet
  • Ability to research trending tags on Steem
sections.installation:
Kindly note that this plugin requires a Steem account to use. We will also use SteemConnect.com to authenticate your account.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/steemwp directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Steem WP screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Do I need a Steem Account to use this plugin?

Yes. You have to log in with a Steem account via Steem Connect to access this plugin.

Is this plugin secure?

Yes. We do not request or access your Steem account keys.

short_description: Connect your site the Steem Blockchain the smart way!
